sentences.english: However, we can not be negated.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我们不能全盘否定。

sentences.english: One wrong move can lose the whole game.

sentences.chinese: 全盘性反传统就是20世纪中国最尴尬的话语表达。

sentences.english: Becky had told him all, not forgetting her own treachery;
sentences.chinese: 贝基把自己的背叛以及泼墨水的事情全盘托出了。

sentences.english: But they did not completely repudiate the traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 但革命者并未对传统文化全盘否定。

sentences.english: He takes the offer after overall considerations.
sentences.chinese: 全盘考虑后他接受了这个职位。

He outed with the whole story.

sentences.english: We did an overall consideration of the matter at last.
sentences.chinese: 最后我们又对这个问题作了全盘考虑。

sentences.english: Every time i suggest an idea, he blowns it to smithereens .

sentences.english: Still, I am not fully confident in these newly formed values.
sentences.chinese: 可是，我仍然无法全盘接受这心血来潮的观念。

sentences.english: Life is like it is good playing chess, one step error, lost.
sentences.chinese: 人生就像弈棋，一步失误，全盘皆输。

sentences.english: It blithely dismissed the open-letter's suggestions with a declaration of denial.

sentences.english: My hope is that there won't be a full-out denial of visas, just the background checks.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这不会是全盘拒签，而仅仅进行背景考察。

sentences.english: Services need to be created with a holistic view of the organization in mind.
sentences.chinese: 需要在全盘考虑整个企业的情况下创建服务。
